level.heading: Application.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be construed as creating in any person, corporation, unincorporated association, partnership, or other entity any right or entitlement to the tax and other development incentives established by this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-177
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-177, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 6-1501.
